content: the original yarn for this pattern has been discontinued find the new version of the pattern here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simple-seamless-double-crochet-hat 1 try this simple seamless technique to make your double_crochet hat without the pesky seam up the middle this pattern is worked from the top down and in continuous rounds if you prefer the traditional double_crochet style pattern with the seam i do have an option for this too and it is linked in the same pattern post have fun trying this seamless technique and whip up some hats today have fun with your yarn rhondda 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simple-seamless-double-crochet-hat
